attributes.action: do not pay the EU another penny for a Brexit deal.
attributes.additional_details:
The EU needs our sales, we purchase more from them than they do from us, they need us to buy their products both before after Brexit, they are taking a billigerant attitude to us and are trying to Hookwink the UK Government into paying more for a Brexit deal.
If the EU does not accept the £20 billion offered the UK Goverment should walk away.
The EU is in a financial crisis, it needs money to balance its books, we are seen as a cash cow ,and they need our contributions to keep them afloat.
attributes.background: The Government has offered the EU £20 Billion for Britain  leave the EU, the EU wants much more money before they will make a deal on Brexit, we must not give the EU anymore money or be bullied into doing so by the unelected EU Eurocrats.
